an5.205:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati.
an5.205:1.4: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu satthari kankhati vicikicchati nadhimuccati na sampasidati, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
an5.205:1.5: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, ayam pathamo cetokhilo.
an5.205:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhu dhamme kankhati …pe…
an5.205:2.4: sabrahmacarisu kupito hoti anattamano ahatacitto khilajato.
an5.205:2.5: Yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabrahmacarisu kupito hoti anattamano ahatacitto khilajato, tassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya.
an5.205:2.6: Yassa cittam na namati atappaya anuyogaya sataccaya padhanaya, ayam pancamo cetokhilo.
